item.title: Dictionary
item.description: Grammer check https://quillbot.com/ https://languagetool.org/ https://www.gingersoftware.com/grammarcheck https://app.linguix.com/docs/my deepl https://www.deepl.com/ Fairy https://github.com/revir/FairyDict Umi-OCR https://github.com/hiroi-sora/Umi-OCR gnome-dictionary sudo apt install gnome-dictionary GoldenDict sudo apt install goldendict artha sudo apt install artha eudic https://www.eudic.net/v4/en/app/download wordnet-gui sudo apt install wordnet-gui iciba, 写作校对 https://www.iciba.com/grammar Dict sudo apt install dict Dict download https://github.com/colordict/colordict.github.io/tree/master https://www.mdict.cn/wp/?page_id=5227&lang=zh
